SEARCH
Package dms.service

Class DVDCollection

java.lang.Object
dms.service.DVDCollection
public class DVDCollection extends Object
Irene Duett, CEN 3024c, 11/12/2025 The DVDCollection class provides full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality for managing DVD records stored in a SQLite database.

This class acts as the service layer between the user interface (CLI or GUI) and the database, handling all SQL operations. It also provides a method to compute the average rating for DVDs filtered by genre.

Usage Example:

     DVDCollection collection = new DVDCollection("C:/path/to/dvds.db");
     collection.addDVD(new DVD(0, "Inception", "Christopher Nolan", 2010, "Sci-Fi", 9.0));
     List<DVD> allDvds = collection.listAll();

  • Constructor Details

    • DVDCollection

      public DVDCollection(String dbUrl)
      Constructs a new DVDCollection object linked to the specified SQLite database. Automatically ensures that the dvd table exists by invoking createTableIfNotExists().
      Parameters:
      dbUrl - the full database connection URL (e.g., "jdbc:sqlite:C:/path/to/dvds.db")

  • Method Details

    • addDVD

      public void addDVD(DVD dvd)
      Adds a new DVD record to the database.
      Parameters:
      dvd - the DVD object to add
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during insertion

    • listAll

      public List<DVD> listAll()
      Retrieves all DVD records from the database.
      Returns:
      a list containing all DVDs currently stored in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while retrieving data

    • findById

      public Optional<DVD> findById(int id)
      Finds a DVD in the database by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the DVD to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found DVD, or empty if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while retrieving data

    • removeDVDById

      public boolean removeDVDById(int id)
      Removes a DVD record from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the DVD to remove
      Returns:
      true if the DVD was successfully deleted; false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during deletion

    • computeAverageRatingByGenre

      public double computeAverageRatingByGenre(String genre)
      Computes the average rating of all DVD records in a specified genre. Only DVDs with non-negative ratings are included in the calculation.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to filter DVDs by
      Returns:
      the average rating for the given genre, or 0.0 if none are found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during computation

    • updateDVD

      public boolean updateDVD(int id, DVD updatedDVD)
      Updates an existing DVD record in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the DVD to update
      updatedDVD - a DVD object containing the new data to apply
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful; false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during update
